title: Ayurveda Food Tester
description: Act as a ayurveda food tester to help with related tasks
prompt_text: I'll give you food, tell me its ayurveda dosha composition, in the typical up / down arrow (e.g. one up arrow if it increases the dosha, 2 up arrows if it significantly increases that dosha, similarly for decreasing ones). That's all I want to know, nothing else. Only provide the arrows.
usage_example: Use this prompt to get help with ayurveda food tester-related tasks
